import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { faNode, faCss3, faGitAlt, faHtml5, faJsSquare, faReact, } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons' import Loader from 'react-loaders' import AnimatedLetters from '../AnimatedLetters' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import './index.scss' const About = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') useEffect(() => { return setTimeout(() => { setLetterClass('text-animate-hover') }, 3000) }, []) return ( <>

I'm final year engineering undergraduate student and very ambitious full-stack developer looking for a role in established IT company with the opportunity to work with the latest technologies on challenging and diverse projects.

I'm quietly confident, naturally curious, and perpetually working on improving my skill by working on latest technologies in the industry.

If I need to define myself in one sentence that would be I am a tech-obsessed!!!

) } export default About
